snippet.title: FEAR FA 98 - Exclusive NEW Gameplay Reveal| FGS LIVE FROM GDC
snippet.description:
An exclusive new gameplay reveal for FEAR FA 98, a twisted 90s inspired sports game that merges old school football games like FIFA and Pro Evo Soccer with the retro survival horror vibes of Silent Hill. Described as an "arcade soccer game with a blood soaked twist", FEAR FA 98 is coming soon to PC. 

https://www.youtube.com/@FutureGamesShow

#FutureGamesShow #FGS #fearfa98 #gdc 

Future Publishing uses the Epidemic Sound Library and Adobe Creative Cloud Generative AI features
